Each listed service or office within this region provides the municipality (Mun.) where it is located, such as Brașov, Sfântu-Gheorghe, Alba-Iulia, Cluj-Napoca, Miercurea Ciuc, Târgu Mureș, Zalău, Sibiu, Timișoara, Arad, Oradea, Reșița, Deva, and Timișoara.
